scripts.deploy:avax: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ joe-defi/bar bar.avax.yaml
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ joe-defi/bar-rinkeby bar.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --access-token  joe-defi/bar bar.avax.yaml
